word: "IN MANY THINGS THE BIBLE LAYS DOWN PRINCIPLES AND WE ARE LEFT TO EXERCISE OUR OWN JUDGMENT IN THE MATTER, WHILE IN MANY OTHER MATTERS A PLAIN COMMAND IS GIVEN. . . . IN HIS INFINITE PLAN [GOD] APPOINTED A PART OF THE ANIMAL KINGDOM TO ACT AS SCAVENGERS. . . . IN ORDER THAT WE MIGHT KNOW THOSE WHICH FEED UPON CLEAN FOOD. HE PLACED A MARK OR BRAND UPON THEM."
